info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued April 19 at 9:05PM CDT until April 20 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS San Angelo TX
info.description:
FFWSJT
The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Coke County in west central Texas... Northeastern Tom Green County in west central Texas...
* Until 100 AM CDT.
* At 902 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across northwest Tom Green county just west of Water Valley and Carlsbad and southern Coke county 8 miles south of Robert Lee was moving east at 35 mph. Up to 3 inches of rain have fallen. The expected rainfall rate is 1.5 inches in 1 hour. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Robert Lee, Blackwell, Bronte, E.V. Spence Reservoir Near Paint Creek Recreation Area, Grape Creek, Orient, Carlsbad, Tennyson, Sanco, Water Valley, Fort Chadbourne, The Intersection Of Highway 208 And Ranch Road 2662, The Intersection Of Highway 158 And Ranch Road 2059, Us-87 Near The Coke-Tom Green County Line, Harriet and Oak Creek Reservoir.
This includes the following Low Water Crossings... FM 1692 crossing Sales Branch, Mule Creek Road crossing Mule Creek, Ratliff crossing just east of Highway 277, Saynor crossing Mule Creek, Juniper Road crossing just east of Highway 277, Juniper crossing Juniper Creek, Poverty Canyon crossing Mule Creek, Marrow Loop crossing east Kicapoo Creek, Hamilton crossing and Ross Rd. crossing Bouzier Creek.
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 1:00 AM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 1:00 AM CDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 1:00 AM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 1:00 AM CDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
